sentences.en: Anne, who was bringing an armful of flowers into the kitchen, saw his face too.
sentences.cn: 安妮, 正抱着花走进厨房, 也看见了他的脸色.

sentences.en: He carried an armful of references back to his desk.
sentences.cn: 他满抱参考资料返回他的课桌.

sentences.en: He groped for an armful of wood and hastened back into the room.
sentences.cn: 他摸索着抱了一捧柴,匆匆回到屋里.

sentences.en: He hurried out with an armful of brochures.
sentences.cn: 他抱着一摞小册子匆匆出去了。

sentences.en: He persevered with his task until he had succeeded in collecting an armful of firewood.
sentences.cn: 他坚守着他的目标,直到成功收集了一抱木柴.

sentences.en: I bent down, gathered an armful of flowers and inhaled their aroma.
sentences.cn: 我弯下身, 摘了一抱,深深地吸纳着它们的芳香.

sentences.en: Jeff an armful of books you have there, Joan.
sentences.cn: 杰夫:琼, 你那儿的书可真多.

sentences.en: She bring in an armful of fresh flower from the garden.
sentences.cn: 她从花园里抱著一抱鲜花进来.

sentences.en: She brought an armful of fresh flowers from the garden.
sentences.cn: 她从花园里抱着一抱“鲜花”进来.

sentences.en: She brought in an armful of fresh flowers from the garden.
sentences.cn: 她从花园里抱着一抱鲜花进来.

sentences.en: She came back with an armful of books.
To this six yuan of forty cents, I have an incomprehension armful.
sentences.cn: 对于这六元四角我抱有不理解.

sentences.en: Tom is carrying an armful of books.

trans.tran_en: the amount of something that you can hold in one or both arms
